name: purebasic-extension
description: PureBasic extension for Visual Studio Code
author: Eddy R.

purebasicLanguage.diagnostics.maxNumberO.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the language server.

purebasicLanguage.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

purebasicLanguage.indentationRules.description: Determines how to indent the source code.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.update: npm update && cd client && npm update && cd ../server && npm update && cd ..
scripts.updatedev: npm update --dev && cd client && npm update --dev && cd ../server && npm update  --dev && cd ..
scripts.audit: cd client && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm audit fix && cd ..
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.publish: rimraf "*.vsix" "**/out" && npm version patch && vsce publish
